name: Lost Reality
description:
Lost Reality is my entry for the Global Game Jam 2021. I'm uploading it here to share it with other people who entered the competition.

In Lost Reality you are a man lost in a strange testing lab. You are given the ability to shift between dimensions, providing a new perspective on the level. Your task is to complete each level and find your way to the exit.

There are currently 5 playable levels in the game, which go over the basic mechanics for the game.

To quit the game, hit escape on the main menu. You can press 'R'/'Select' to restart a level if you get stuck (this can happen), and you can hit escape/'Start' to return to the main menu. The game has controller support (tested on USB Xbox 360 controller), but you will have to navigate the end-of-level menu's with a mouse.
